title.value: US Public Health Message Type Codes

description.value: The US Public Health Message Header Events CodeSystem is a 'starter set' of codes supported for identifying types of messages being exchanged.

display.value: Indicates a message containing a case report from clinical care to PHA.

definition.value: Indicates a message that contains data for a specific case report. Case reports can be created for different conditions such as Hep C, Cancer etc.

display.value: Indicates a mesage containing cancer reporting data from clinical care to PHA.

definition.value: Indicates that cancer data is present in the message being sent from clinical care to PHA.

display.value: Indicates a mesage containing cancer report response data from PHA to clinical care.

definition.value: Indicates that a message containing response data for an already submitted cancer report is being sent from PHA to clinical care.

display.value: Indicates a mesage containing Hep C data from clinical care to PHA.

definition.value: Indicates that Hep C data is present in the message being sent from clinical care to PHA.

display.value: Hep C Response Message from PHA to clinical care.

definition.value: Indicates that a message containing response data for an already submitted Hep C report message is being sent from PHA to clinical care.

display.value: Indicates a mesage containing healthcare survey data from clinical care to PHA.

definition.value: Indicates a healthcare survey data is present in the message being sent from clinical care to PHA.

display.value: Indicates a mesage containing healthcare survey data from PHA to clinical care.

definition.value: Indicates a healthcare survey data is present in the response being sent from PHA o clinical care in repsonse to a healthcare survey report message.
